QuestData.Title: Breaking Hag
QuestData.Description:
The town is overrun!
The guards have fallen back and what is worse, some of the villagers have been twisted by the witches' magic. They are little more than wretched beasts blindly following orders.
We must release these poor souls and slay the monsters that twisted them!
See what you can do to cut down the numbers of monsters in town!
QuestData.CompletionText: We have a little breathing room.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done. You've thinned their numbers.
